content: Buzz—Buzz—

content:
There are three different colors.
Just as I thought, it's the legendary...
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Is that a bee I hear—
Oh, it's just my phone.
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Have you been watching me?
How did you know?!
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: CLANG——
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Even though you wandered off on your own through two blocks,
three Astralinks and seven streets,
you're still a member of our exploration team.
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Don't talk to me about "rules,"
sorry not sorry,
those words don't exist in my dictionary.
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: Run, Bhan—
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Good thing I can run fast.
Looks like I need to find a new place to hang out, Bhan...
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Sunlight is essential for examining gems,
Water is essential for cleaning minerals,
And as for friends,{短暂停}you're all I need.
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: How are you so good at chasing, Bhan!{生气}
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
I like to follow my intuition,
And my gut tells me you're a good one!
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Shows pleochroism, good transparency, with minor impurities.
Hardness and density still unknown... oh?
Under sunlight refraction, it can...

content: You know, according to the <color=#8AAB4B>rules</color> of the Dyer's District, the whole ore must be kept intact, and then...
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: You!—
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
So, can you recommend any Astralink routes?
Somewhere I can be alone,
You know, just quietly play with rocks!
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: What kind of places do you like?
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
What kind of place...
A place with sunshine, flowing water, and friends.
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: Is that the legendary three-colored gemstone?
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: Because I'm right behind you.
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: I can't let you run around by yourself.
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Your Astralink? Interesting.
Got any spare rooms?
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: Not yet, I'll go back and prepare.
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content:
Thanks in advance then!
I'll go pack my bags,
and I'll come visit once you get in touch!
info: 得到特别宝石-热贝尔_主流程文本2

content: Come join our Astralink!
